ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Support from the Medical Research Council, Wellcome Trust, European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7 grant agreement no. 242167). T Le Bihan and L Imrie at SynthSys, University of Edinburgh for mass spectrometry sample analysis. The LC-MS QExactive equipment was purchased by a Wellcome Trust Institutional Strategic Support Fund and a strategic award from the Wellcome Trust for the Centre for Immunity, Infection and Evolution (095831/Z/11/Z). D Maizels for artwork.
